channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL MVP Cases: Top Week 17 Plays From 5 Leading Candidates As Race Heats Up
item.description: Josh Allen, Trevor Lawrence, Drake Maye, Matthew Stafford and Caleb Williams continued building their MVP cases with the regular season winding down.

item.title: 2025 NFL MVP Odds, Race: Drake Maye Takes Over as Favorite in 2-Man Contest
item.description: Matthew Stafford might have lost the NFL MVP award with an underwhelming Week 17 performance.

item.title: Oregon's Ehis Etute goes coast-to-coast for game-tying layup, sending game to overtime against Michigan
item.description: Oregon's Ehis Etute went coast-to-coast for game-tying layup, sending game to overtime vs. Michigan.

item.title: Michigan's Olivia Olson drives right for CLUTCH and-one finish, sending game to double overtime against Oregon
item.description: Michigan's Olivia Olson drove right for CLUTCH and-one finish, sending game to double overtime against Oregon.

item.title: 2025 NFL Power Rankings Week 18: Which Super Bowl Contenders Do We Trust?
item.description: Ralph Vacchiano sorts out the NFL's hierarchy after every week of the 2025 season.

item.title: Updated NFL Power Rankings: New 1-32 poll, plus what we learned about each team this season
item.description: Let's update our NFL Power Rankings one more time ahead of Week 18. We also picked out lessons for all 32 teams in 2025.

item.title: Our NBA cheat sheet for 2026: Big questions, awards picks and All-NBA rosters
item.description: Here are the biggest storylines you missed in the first half of the 2025-26 regular season, and what to watch in the New Year.

item.title: Our 2025 All-Rookie Team: We picked standout first-years at every single position
item.description: We know Carson Schwesinger makes the list at LB, but is Cam Ward or Tyler Shough the QB1?

item.title: CFP quarterfinals mega-preview: Connelly's keys to all four matchups
item.description: We break down Ohio State-Miami, Texas Tech-Oregon, Indiana-Alabama and Georgia-Ole Miss.

item.title: 'We found our guy': Texas Tech's gamble on a high school coaching legend has paid off
item.description: Joey McGuire has his team in the quarterfinals of the CFP, but he was a relative unknown when he was hired.
